org.apache.beam.sdk.util.state

Interface StateBinder<K>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - the type of key this binder embodies.

    public interface StateBinder<K>
    Visitor for binding a StateSpec and to the associated State.

      • bindWatermark

        <W extends BoundedWindow> WatermarkHoldState<W> bindWatermark(String id,
                                                              StateSpec<? super K,WatermarkHoldState<W>> spec,
                                                              OutputTimeFn<? super W> outputTimeFn)
        Bind to a watermark StateSpec.

        This accepts the OutputTimeFn that dictates how watermark hold timestamps added to the returned WatermarkHoldState are to be combined.
